title: Massachusetts 'House of Horrors' case involving abused foster children locked in dog cages reaches settlement
description: The lawsuit alleges that Massachusetts foster children were locked in dog crates, forced to perform sex acts, submerged in ice paths to the point of drowning and threatened with death while under the care of their foster care parents.

title: Tiffani Thiessen says she feels 'at ease' about aging ahead of 50th birthday: 'Not really giving a s---'
description: Tiffani Thiessen opened up about aging ahead of turning 50 in January. The actress said she feels "so much more at ease" now than she did 10 years ago.

title: Cardinals social media mocks Russell Wilson's airplane workout after preseason win; post later deleted
description: The Arizona Cardinals celebrated their preseason win over the Denver Broncos by recalling quarterback Russell Wilson's infamous high knees airplane workout.

title: 9/11 families, first responders split over being offered affordable housing at Ground Zero
description: Some families and loved ones of victims of the 9/11 terror attacks were "baffled" by the state's offer of below-market rate apartments next to Ground Zero.

title: Vietnam veteran would have been laid to rest alone but American Legion 'brothers' wouldn't let that happen
description: Vietnam Navy veteran Anthony L. Meizis died without anyone to lay him to rest. One group of Massachusetts bikers answered the call to honor his memory.

title: Grandma, 84, slammed to ground after allegedly being attacked on Los Angeles bus, video shows
description: An alleged violent attack on a Los Angeles bus left an 84-year-old grandmother sprawled on the ground unconscious.

title: Johnny Manziel's former Browns teammate reveals when he knew team would have 'problems' with him
description: Johnny Manziel did not live up to his Heisman Trophy stock in the NFL, and his former teammate, Joe Thomas, had a feeling that would happen.

title: So you want to learn a new language? Here are tips to get you fluent in no time
description: Learning a new language takes time and dedication. The more ways you can incorporate the language into your life, the better you'll learn. Here are smart tips.

title: Famed investor says Disney’s most profitable asset could be far from family friendly in near future
description: Porter Bibb believes Disney's sports-gambling products will be its most profitable asset in the near future, a far cry from the family friendly image the Mouse House desires.

title: Joe Biden could lose the presidency because of Afghanistan: Marc Thiessen

title: The Pentagon plans to shake up DC’s National Guard, criticized for its response to protests, Jan. 6
description: As Washington, D.C. struggles with crowd control while hosting several large events, the Pentagon has suggested expanding National Guard powers.

title: Guardians’ Jose Ramirez has suspension for role in Tim Anderson fight reduced
description: Cleveland Guardians star Jose Ramirez had his three-game suspension for his role in a fight with Tim Anderson of the Chicago White Sox reduced to two games.

title: DeSantis takes aim at Trump as 2024 rivals hold competing events at the Iowa State Fair
description: Former President Donald Trump and Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis, his top rival for the Republican presidential nomination, hold competing events at the Iowa State Fair

title: Boston doctor charged with masturbating in front of teen girl on Hawaii flight: Prosecutors
description: A Boston doctor is being charged after allegedly masturbating and exposing himself next to a 14-year-old girl while on a flight to Boston.

title: Kade Warner makes NFL debut in same stadium dad Kurt Warner played Super Bowl: 'You can’t make this stuff up'

title: Former Georgia Lt. Gov. Geoff Duncan to testify before grand jury Tuesday ahead of possible Trump indictment
description: The former Georgia Lt. governor said on Saturday that he has been called to testify before a grand jury ahead of a possible indictment of former President Trump.

title: 49ers make quarterback decision for first preseason game
description: Brock Purdy is the favorite to win the San Francisco 49ers' starting quarterback job, but they still are giving 2021 third-overall pick Trey Lance a good look.

title: Astros' first baseman ends eight-year home run drought, hits two against Angels
description: Houston Astros first baseman Jon Singleton snapped an eight-year home run drought on Friday, hitting two home runs against the Los Angeles Angels.

title: Bills' Damar Hamlin plays in first game since cardiac arrest
description: Buffalo Bills safety Damar Hamlin returned to game action Saturday for the first time since his on-field cardiac arrest during a January game.

title: Former U.S. Senator claims he once threatened to ‘kick the s—t’ out of Joe Biden for treatment of his wife
description: Former U.S. Senator Scott Brown recalled telling off Joe Biden years ago, saying he threatened to "kick the s--t out of him."

title: Jennifer Lopez, Paris Hilton and Heidi Klum soak up the sun on summer vacations
description: Paris Hilton looks pretty in pink as she cools off on a yacht, and Heidi Klum vacations with her family in Italy.

title: David Weiss is starting an investigation to cover for the Bidens: Judge Jeanine

title: Johnny Manziel rips NCAA over refusal to return Reggie Bush's Heisman Trophy
description: The NCAA determined that Reggie Bush was ineligible for his 2005 Heisman Trophy, because he and his family had accepted impermissible benefits, including cash and travel expenses.,

title: Tall, burly Oleksiy Danilov is one of the key players in Ukraine’s brave fight against Russia

title: Emergency water barrels for migrants disappear near border amid heat wave: report
description: A dozen water barrels left in key areas of the wilderness near the border in Jim Hogg County, Texas, have disappeared without a clear lead.

title: Critics warn California bill protecting school officials would punish parents who speak out at board meetings
description: A new bill is advancing in the California legislature that would criminalize harassment of any school official. The bill's vague language, critics said, will punish parents for speaking out.

title: Missing Washington girl was allegedly locked in 'cell' under stairs as mom battles investigators
description: Oakley Carlson, 6, was last seen alive in February 2021. Court records show she was locked in a "cell" by her parents, who are not cooperating with investigators.

title: Migrant boat crossing Channel from France capsizes, at least six dead
description: At least six people died, and more than 50 were rescued, after a migrant boat attempted to cross the English Channel and capsized, French authorities said.

title: I was diagnosed with testicular cancer. Here’s the secret I soon learned

title: A's broadcaster rips team's owner, calls impending move to Las Vegas 'not professional'

description: Democrats have full control of Michigan's government, but the crucial Midwestern state may be a key general election battleground in the 2024 elections, as there are signs that many areas are trending back to Republica

title: Audubon Society pressured to give ‘social justice’ to the birding community after George Floyd’s death
description: The National Audubon Society is taking flack after the group refused to change its name despite pressure from some members of the socially conscious birding community.

title: Arizona woman discovers snake in worst possible place in her home
description: An Arizona woman came home after a four day trip to a slithering surprise and found a pink coachwhip snake chilling out inside her toilet. Video of the snake's removal has gone viral.

description: Former Vice President Mike Pence said Friday that he will attack former President Trump and Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis for not supporting federal abortion restrictions.

description: Fox News contributor Jonathan Turley argues AG Merrick Garland may have "fueled" calls for an impeachment inquiry into President Biden with his recent special counsel appointment on "The Story."

title: Chinese fishing ban blasted as PR stunt that does 'nothing' to protect wildlife
description: A nonprofit dedicated to ocean conservation has raised concerns that China’s recent fishing ban amounts to little more than a PR stunt since the country allegedly doesn’t fish much in the recently banned areas.

title: Wild manatee sex rituals spark issues for Florida police: 'If you see this, no you didn't'
description: The Pinellas County Sheriff’s Office is urging the public to stop calling 911 over spotting multiple manatees gathering in the water, explaining the marine mammals are just mating.

title: I just reread George Orwell's '1984' and the novel is scarier than ever
description: It's been 75 years since author George Orwell penned his final novel: "1984." I reread the novel this year and Orwell's vision of a totalitarian society is scarier than ever.

title: Vermont dog relocated, up for adoption in New Jersey after flooding threatens shelter
description: A two-year-old hound mix, originally from Vermont, is looking for his forever home after he was relocated to New Jersey due to major community flooding.

title: Family of suspected serial killer reveals chaotic mess inside accused murderer's ramshackle home
description: Photographs of a rundown Massapequa Park home show how police left it after spending nearly two weeks removing evidence in the cold case Gilgo Beach murders.

title: CRISIS IN KENSINGTON: Drug users flood the streets of this lawless Philadelphia neighborhood
description: In Kensington, Philadelphia's open-air drug market, users can be seen passed out on the pavement or injecting themselves with needles on a main street.

title: Georgia teacher trying to reverse firing for reading controversial book on gender identity to 5th graders
description: A Georgia fifth-grade public school teacher took the stand in an effort to save her job after she was fired for reading her students a book on gender identity.

title: Wisconsin mother sentenced 25 years for strangling daughter to death
description: A Wisconsin judge sentenced a mother to 25 years in prison on Friday after she was found guilty of strangling and killing her 10-year-old daughter.

title: House Dem warns AI could be a tool of ‘digital colonialism’ without ‘inclusivity’ guardrails
description: A House Democrat put forward a new resolution calling on the U.S. to work closely with nations in the Western Hemisphere to create a more inclusive artificial intelligence.

title: Texas animal shelter employee allegedly abused, killed kittens: officials
description: An animal shelter employee in Texas was arrested after allegedly killing kittens and may be connected to the shelter's recent uptick in kitten deaths.

title: On this day in history, August 12, 1990, 'Sue' the Tyrannosaurus rex is discovered
description: The largest and best-preserved Tyrannosaurus rex fossil was discovered in South Dakota on this day in history, August 12, 1990. The fossil was dubbed "Sue" after the woman who discovered it.
